resources.string:
Succulent Care Guide:

 • Light: Bright, direct sunlight (4-6 hours daily)
 • Water: Every 2-3 weeks (let soil dry completely)
 • Soil: Well-draining cactus mix
 • Tip: Avoid getting water on leaves to prevent rot

Tree Care Guide:

 • Water: Deep watering weekly (more when young)
 • Pruning: Remove dead branches in late winter
 • Fertilizer: Slow-release in early spring
 • Tip: Mulch around base to retain moisture

Bush Care Guide:

 • Water: 1-2 times per week (more in heat)
 • Pruning: Shape after flowering season
 • Sun: 4-6 hours daily (varies by species)
 • Tip: Leave space between bushes for air flow

Grass Care Guide:

 • Water: 1 inch per week (early morning)
 • Mowing: Keep 3-4 inches tall
 • Fertilize: 3-4 times per growing season
 • Tip: Leave clippings as natural fertilizer
